channel.title: Finally got my IPhone 3G
channel.description:
Well yea... i finally got my iphone 3g on contract... Have to say im glad i got it :) I just find the amount of free apps abit limiting :/ Theres only 100 free apps that i can find.. And most, well pretty much suck. Dont really wanna pay for any Paid apps, If i do they wont be the expensive ones.
Anyone else got an iphone 3g and would like to share Help and opinions?
I also noticed its hard to set an mp3 as your ringtones.. And you cant set your own custom text tone..
Anyone know how?

item.title: Finally got my IPhone 3G
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:15, topic:253892”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=335407.msg2609055#msg2609055 date=1230686551]
What is the GPS like on that? Is it like you can just walk anywhere and it’ll bring up a map of where you are?

I’d really enjoy having that, otherwise the Iphone doesn’t really appeal to me.
[/quote]G1 for T-mobile = win.[/quote]
i love the phone but t-mobile is a shit network

item.title: Finally got my IPhone 3G

item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

I like the iPhone. Most of my friends have one so I use them a lot.
Only thing I don’t like is the inability to receive MMS.

Other than that, it’s great.

item.title: Finally got my IPhone 3G
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:10, topic:253892”][quote author=Cain_ link=topic=335407.msg2611791#msg2611791 date=1230791554]

i just got the itouch but i have used an iphone, what does suck is that it doesnt read the instructions out loud to you in the GPS. If your driving your concentration shouldnt be on looking at a small screen but rather whats on the road

Are you forgetting its ment to be a phone, Not a sat nav?

For the cost of the steaming pile of shit we’re talking about it should do that too.
[/quote]
also it does have a speaker so why shouldnt it be able to give directions?[/quote]

i suppose you would be able to get an application for that though?

Read full topic

item.title: Finally got my IPhone 3G
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Yea, It comes up with google maps, Like you can chose between Maps, Satalite or Hybrid… And you press this little crosshair and it finds where you are and goes to you. Then you can like have directions to another place… It will work out a route… And at the top you can chose between if you are traveling by Car, Bus or walking… Obvoiusly picking different routes for each… I find that its not extremely accurate… But then the area i was in wasnt in the 3g area. But 2g really doesnt take that long.

Read full topic
